question:
####[UFAQ 23](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Whispers_in_Nalubaale_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
Does the Runner have to shuffle the stack after searching it with Compile?
answer: Per the rules on searching a deck for cards, after a search is performed, the deck must be shuffled immediately before proceeding with any remaining effects initiated by the search.
